#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

#define forn(i,N) for(int i=0; i<N; i++)

int M,N;
int **arr;

void proceed(int a, int b)
{
    a-1>=0 && arr[a-1][b]!=-1 ? arr[a-1][b]+=1 : true;
    a+1< M && arr[a+1][b]!=-1 ? arr[a+1][b]+=1 : true;
    b-1>=0 && arr[a][b-1]!=-1 ? arr[a][b-1]+=1 : true;
    b+1< N && arr[a][b+1]!=-1 ? arr[a][b+1]+=1 : true;

    a-1>=0 && b-1>=0 && arr[a-1][b-1]!=-1 ? arr[a-1][b-1]+=1 : true;
    a-1>=0 && b+1< N && arr[a-1][b+1]!=-1 ? arr[a-1][b+1]+=1 : true;
    a+1< M && b-1>=0 && arr[a+1][b-1]!=-1 ? arr[a+1][b-1]+=1 : true;
    a+1< M && b+1< N && arr[a+1][b+1]!=-1 ? arr[a+1][b+1]+=1 : true;
}

int main(void)
{
    int k=0;
    string str;
    while(1)
    {
        scanf("%d%d",&M,&N);

        if(M==0 && N==0)
        	break;

        k++;
        arr=new int*[M+1];
        forn(i,M+1)
           arr[i]=new int[N+1];

        forn(i,M)
        {
            cin>>str;
            if(str.size()>1 || str[0]=='*')
                forn(j,N)
                    str[j]=='*' ? arr[i][j]=-1 : arr[i][j]=0;
            else
                forn(j,N)
                    arr[i][j]=0;
        }

        forn(i,M)
            forn(j,N)
            	if(arr[i][j]==-1)
            	   	proceed(i,j);

        cout<<"Field #"<<k<<":"<<endl;
        forn(i,M)
        {
            forn(j,N)
               arr[i][j]==-1 ? cout<<"*" : cout<<arr[i][j];
            cout<<endl<<endl;
        }

        forn(i,M+1)
            delete[] arr[i];
        delete[] arr;
    }

//    system("pause");
}
